callbackUrl.description: URL to redirect user to after he's responded to the notification. This can be set to any (valid) dummy URL if you don't need to have the user browser wait for his response to the notification.

urgent.description: If this notification must be read urgently by the user

centeredHorizontal.description: Indicate if the text should be centered horizontally in the screen

centeredVertical.description: Indicate if the text should be centered vertically in the screen

denyConfirmMsg.description: If this is set and the user attempts to deny the approval, this text will be displayed and the user requested to confirm the denial

approveConfirmMsg.description: If this is set and the user attempts to deny the approval, this text will be displayed and the user requested to confirm the approval

denyMsg.description: If this is set and the user denies the request, the user will be displayed this message

approveMsg.description: If this is set and the approves the request, the user will be displayed this message

securityLevel.description: Security level for the approval request (if not set will default to website suggested security level)
